elements.text: You're looking through clothes at a store and decide to try on a sweater right off the rack. You're having a hard time getting the sweater on and start to worry that someone will notice how uncoordinated you are. As you look around, you see that others are focused on their...

elements.name: Shopping for Clothes_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
